summary: Texture changes based on Ebony Lace and Nightingale Lace by DizzasterJuice.
descriptionHtml:
Texture changes based on and requires Ebony Lace by DizzasterJuice.
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1572

"Female Ebony armor with transparency alpha and skin/body mesh.
It is playable as an alpha version but there is some clipping on NPCs when her head is turned to the extreme left/right. There is some clipping at arm straps on player characters."

Changes made:
Made some parts smaller and removed the skirting for a more light armor look.
Changed the material above the thigh plates to chain mail.
Changed the breastplate to the Ebonymail Lace version.
Changed the belt to leather.
New normal map removing the shine on the belt and making it slightly less shiny overall.

Notes:
Contains only the body armor.
This is an Ebony armor replacer for female characters.
The mesh is required from the original mod.

Other mods by me:
[spoiler]
